extendedInfo.description: School may be out for summer, but the gossip is flying faster than ever in School 26: Summer of Secrets. Play as Kate as she navigates the social landscape with her new friends. Help them overcome difficult issues, establish love connections, and bring your friends together so that they can enter an epic battle of the bands.Along the way, everyone has a secret theyâre itching to tell you. Convince your friends to dish, then use your tact to share their secrets with the right people. If you succeed, youâll help your friends out. Will you become the ultimate people-uniter, bringing your friends together in harmony... or the school blabbermouth?School 26: Summer of Secrets features the music of indie rock band Hey Ocean!

reviews.title: Crashsisters
reviews.comment: The concept is good..animation is also likable.. But the app crashes afta few min into the game.. Fix itt.. U will fare well..
reviews.author: Megha Thomas

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This is definitely more fun than the first game and love the additional features with secrets but not sure if gameplay will last long enough to justify the price of buying the full version
reviews.author: Chrissy Pang

reviews.title: Its alright
reviews.comment: The game is good it sucks you cannot respond to characters and it doesn\'t save even after buying full version... you can only do facial expressions and you can\'t type in your name in the beginning the keyboard doesn\'t pop up on the screen

reviews.title: Sucks!!
reviews.comment: This game is not fun at all!! Its all reading and there is no objective. Dont buy it!! Its not worth a dollar!!

reviews.title: well..

I tried speaking to her again and there\'s nothing except me walking to and fro trying to work our what else to do.

reviews.author: Summer High

reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: I played the full version! Even better than the first!!!!!! Keep up the good work! Seriously! I was so addicted, I played this my whole Friday night! But to make it better I really want her to kinda be able to pick the path of the story or for the emotions to actually make a difference to the story! I really want her to get with Ryan!!!! I want to be able to say things not just say emotions! But please make these ajustments and IT swear! This maybe the game I have been waiting for! Comment and agree if you want this to happen!!!!!!! :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-)

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I love this game and had no troubles with starting it but after getting it I finished it within five mins so I think the whole thing should be free and I think anyone else with this game that loves it will agree
